entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -34.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
